sentences.en: A climate with high temperature and arid condition is highly favourable for salt weathering.
sentences.cn: 高温和干旱相结合的气候最有利于盐风化过程。

sentences.en: And then through supergene weathering mineralization, weathering type gold deposit was formed.
sentences.cn: 再经表生同化成矿作用形成风化型金矿床.

sentences.en: Both lateritic deposit and gossan deposit are of weathering origin.
sentences.cn: 红土型金矿床、铁帽型金矿床同属风化淋滤成因的残坡积表生金矿床.

sentences.en: Certain plants play an additional role in weathering .

sentences.en: In many porphyry copper deposits, additional enrichment of the metal has been caused by surficial weathering.
sentences.cn: 在许多斑岩铜矿矿床中, 地表风化使得金属铜进一步富集.

sentences.en: Organic rubbers develop a resinous surface crust through weathering.
sentences.cn: 有机橡胶经过风蚀后,逐呈现出树脂状的外表.

sentences.en: The effects of weathering can be simulated in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 在实验室里可以模拟各种天气产生的影响.

sentences.en: The magnesite originated from the peridotite by weathering.
sentences.cn: 菱镁矿是由橄榄岩风化形成的.

sentences.en: The movement of water is also an important weathering force.
sentences.cn: 水的运动也是一种重要的风化作用力.

sentences.en: The rock is resistant to weathering and erosion.
sentences.cn: 这种岩石不易风化和侵蚀.

sentences.en: This is due to the higher weathering resistance of hydrothermally altered rock.
sentences.cn: 这是由于热液蚀变岩石具有较高的抗风化力的缘故.

sentences.en: This suggests that the optimum for biological weathering would be in a hot, moist climate.
sentences.cn: 这表明生物风化最适宜的条件是湿热气候。

sentences.en: Weathering applies to crumbling and breaking down of rock into smaller pieces.
sentences.cn: 风化指的是岩石破碎或崩裂成小块.

sentences.en: Weathering of rock is essentially a static process.
sentences.cn: 岩石的风化作用基本上是一种静力作用.

sentences.en: Weathering prepares the rock for transport by decomposing and disintegrating it.
sentences.cn: 风化作用通过分解和崩解准备了要搬运的岩石.
